bgDescription:
A solid solvent created using a special process that boosts the Echo Forte you cast.
Said to be invented by a self-proclaimed aspiring Echo Training Master.
description: Increases the damage of all Resonators' Echo skills in the party by 40% for 180s, effective only on your own Resonators in Co-op.
obtainDescription: Increases the damage of all Resonators' Echo skills in the party by 40% for 180s, effective only on your own Resonators in Co-op.
